quotes.quote: Remember your connection with the cosmos. Remember your connection with the infinity and that remembrance will give you the freedom.
When you have the power to love, that strength, that courage is infinite; that love is infinite. There is nothing finite about it's presence, for love. never. dies.
If you bow only to the infinite that is within you. You will stand in front of the entire world.
By reaching for infinity, you reach the core of yourself.

The idea of infinity cannot be expressed in words or even described, but it can be apprehended through art, which makes infinity tangible. The absolute is only attainable through faith and in the creative act.
Infinity is the end. End without infinity is but a new beginning.
The infinity of the universe is a great blessing for human beings, because human beings’ desire to discover is also infinite!
Sometimes we need a wise guide to peel back the ceiling of our lives to remind us that infinity never places any limits on our skies.
It's not whether your love is temporary or has infinity. It's about the feeling of infinity when you're in love
Life is not about finding our limitations, it's about finding our infinity.
The meaning of life is contained in every single expression of life. It is present in the infinity of forms and phenomena that exist in all of creation.
Your limits are somewhere up there, waiting for you to reach beyond infinity.
In this unbelievable universe in which we live, there are no absolutes. Even parallel lines, reaching into infinity, meet somewhere yonder.
Humanity is made up of an infinity of different individuals. Each of us travels for motives exclusively his own.
Every idea, extended into infinity, becomes its own opposite.
Infinity converts the possible into the inevitable.
What does infinity mean to you? Are you not infinity and yourself?
The Way is deep and broad and in all directions? Infinity.
The thirst for the infinite proves infinity.
The word or symbol infinity represents something that is seemingly ongoing, never ending, beyond calculation.
Gods wisdom exceeds infinity.
All the beautiful roads are infinite because beauty gives us the feeling of infinity!
Seeing eye to an eye is a must, especially when there lies a case, or an intent, to meet; even by infinity
Certainty is absence of infinity, infinity is presence of uncertainty.
The final end of Eternity, and the beginning of Infinity
Hold infinity in the palm of your hand.
Have you ever once in your life reached out to touch infinity?
Yes, if you're looking for infinity, just close your eyes!
There can be no centre in infinity.
